TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have taught us the secrets of a new Technology!
TEXT.French: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have taught us the secrets of a new Technology!
TEXT.German: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have taught us the secrets of a new Technology!
TEXT.Italian: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have taught us the secrets of a new Technology!
TEXT.Spanish: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have taught us the secrets of a new Technology!

TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have shared their star charts of nearby space with us!
TEXT.French: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have shared their star charts of nearby space with us!
TEXT.German: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have shared their star charts of nearby space with us!
TEXT.Italian: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have shared their star charts of nearby space with us!
TEXT.Spanish: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have shared their star charts of nearby space with us!

TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have given us valuable goods as tribute.
TEXT.French: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have given us valuable goods as tribute.
TEXT.German: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have given us valuable goods as tribute.
TEXT.Italian: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have given us valuable goods as tribute.
TEXT.Spanish: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have given us valuable goods as tribute.

TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have agreed to join our empire!
TEXT.French: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have agreed to join our empire!
TEXT.German: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have agreed to join our empire!
TEXT.Italian: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have agreed to join our empire!
TEXT.Spanish: We have made first contact with an alien race! They have agreed to join our empire!

TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! The contact went badly- they attempted to shoot down our ship with primitive weapons!
TEXT.French: We have made first contact with an alien race! The contact went badly- they attempted to shoot down our ship with primitive weapons!
TEXT.German: We have made first contact with an alien race! The contact went badly- they attempted to shoot down our ship with primitive weapons!
TEXT.Italian: We have made first contact with an alien race! The contact went badly- they attempted to shoot down our ship with primitive weapons!
TEXT.Spanish: We have made first contact with an alien race! The contact went badly- they attempted to shoot down our ship with primitive weapons!

TEXT.English: We have made first contact with an alien race! We have taught them the secrets of warp travel and they have become a new major power!
